ModMetadata.Name: MoreCables
ModMetadata.Author: Spacebuilder2020
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]MoreCables[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad
This mod adds two new cables to the base game, (super heavy and super conductor). Default for new cables is 500kW and 1MW. It also allows both vanilla cables and mod cables to be configured for different voltages than default.
Source Code: https://github.com/spacebuilder2020/MoreCablesMod
ModMetadata.InGameDescription: MoreCables WARNING: This is a StationeersLaunchPad Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersLaunchPad plugin. See: https://github.com/StationeersLaunchPad/StationeersLaunchPad This mod adds two new cables to the base game, (super heavy and super conductor). Default for new cables is 500kW and 1MW. It also allows both vanilla cables and mod cables to be configured for different voltages than default.
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]0.5:[/h3] [list] [*] First Pass at adding better cables [/list]
